item.description:
Hello All,

Happy St. Patty's

Please take a moment to read the complete update below.... Thank you to all who attended our last Meetup! It was another great success.

Our March meetup will continue to meet at Doggie Day at 1PM. Should anyone have any questions please contact me or post on our message boards. Again, I can not stress enough the importance of the RSVP...since we are indoors right now, we must keep a limit on the number of guests....to prevent overcrowding and provide the safest happiest environment for our pets and their parents. Thank you....


Note:
There is some free parking located behind Doggieday Playcenter (Tremont Street) and the CVS, for non-residents of the area there are also plenty of metered spots near DoggieDay located on Tremont street as well as "South End visitor parking spots" located on each end of the street in the South end . Although those may be harder to come by.

Stay well....ST




DOGGIE DAY PLAYCENTER ( 400 Tremont Street, South end, Boston,02116 ...our usual location 1:00PM ONLY!
http://www.doggieday....
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua March Meeting
